entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Kawartha Lakes (Fenelon Falls)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:56 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 0.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 5:57 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Light Rain
Temperature: 0.8°C
Pressure: 100.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -4.8°C
Wind: W 22 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening then becoming light late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming east 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:55 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
